thread.title: Texas serial bomber was a "challenged young man": police

title: Texas serial bomber was a "challenged young man": police
text:
Texas serial bomber was a 'challenged young man:' police 7:03am EDT - 01:34 
Mark Conditt, the 23-year-old Texas man whose deadly bomb attacks terrorized the city of Austin for weeks, left a 25-minute video 'confession' on a cell phone found after he blew himself up when officers closed in to arrest him.   
Mark Conditt, the 23-year-old Texas man whose deadly bomb attacks terrorized the city of Austin for weeks, left a 25-minute video 'confession' on a cell phone found after he blew himself up when officers closed in to arrest him.  //reut.rs/2IIsdXL
